text: The Aberto de Brasília is a professional tennis tournament played on outdoor hard courts. It is currently part of the Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP) Challenger Tour. It is held annually in the capital of Brazil, Brasília, since 2009. ==Past finals== ===Singles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runner-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2010 || Tatsuma Ito || Izak van der Merwe || 6–4, 6–4 |- | 2009 || Ricardo Mello || Juan Ignacio Chela || 7–6(2), 6–4 |} ===Doubles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champions !width="200"|Runners-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2010 || Franco Ferreiro André Sá || Ricardo Mello Caio Zampieri || 7–6(5), 6–3 |- | 2009 || Marcelo Demoliner Rodrigo Guidolin || Ricardo Mello Caio Zampieri || 6–4, 6–2 |} ==External links== *Official Site *ITF Search Category:ATP Challenger Tour Category:Hard court tennis tournaments Category:Tennis tournaments in Brazil
title: Aberto de Brasília
